speaker: Ashen Steppe
line: Snow thins to gray dust. The ground is littered with scorched reeds and stones that refuse to cool.

speaker: Old Footprints
line: Many were made in a hurry. Too many end abruptly.

speaker: Your Journal
line: A place like this breeds errands and tragedies.
